name: Blocks and Bones
description:
Discord:  https://discord.gg/TpjnJ5RnkF

In zombie mode, you kill endless waves of zombies as you unlock new areas and weapons, while finding health and ammo. Whenever you get bored of one level, just go find another one! No need to pay for DLC maps like the old days. 

In edit mode, you build custom levels to craft a terrifying experience for other people to survive in. Will you build a large open field, or a tight cave system with undead popping out from every corner? Maybe you'll rebuild a classic from games of the past. Zombies in Peach's Castle? Der Riese from Call of Duty?  Don't mind if I do.

Whatever you make, or if you're just looking for maps, Discord is a great place to share levels with each other and have discussions about the game. 

This game is in an early state and may be unstable or broken.  I'll continue working on this game and will eventually move towards a Steam release. Sharing maps will be easy and integrated in-game with Steam's Workshop, and multiplayer is a hopeful goal. 

I'm excited for the future of this project and hope to see you around.
